attributes.action: Government to introduce identity cards for all to include prints and photo ID.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has no control over the UK population, the government has no idea how many illegal people are in the UK and therefore without ID cards cannot control terrorists, criminals or illegal immigrants. The government wasted billions of pounds on ineffective PPE equipment they must do something positive to bring control to our country or we will lose control to undocumented aliens.
attributes.background: Make national identity cards mandatory for all adults living in the UK and give police powers to check anyones identity cards.

rejection.details:
We understand you want the Government to introduce mandatory biometric ID cards, however it's not clear how the introduction of such cards would result in the 'control' of 'terrorists, criminals or illegal immigrants'.

You could have a petition calling for the introduction of mandatory biometric ID cards, but you would have to make clear how they would deliver the outcomes you want to see.
